derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Latin maritalis, from maritus 'husband'

entry.def: Marital is used to describe things relating to marriage.

example.ex: Caroline was keen to make her marital home in London...
example.tran: 卡罗琳渴望婚后把家安在伦敦。

example.ex: Her son had no marital problems.
example.tran: 她的儿子没有婚姻问题。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the state of marriage;
